--- In gladiator@y..., jackk1981@h... wrote:
>   Just registered Gladiator last week (even though I should be 
> studying for finals).  Great game, currently taking my team through 
> the TevFifty, which btw is extremely well done.  

Great idea to take teams through the tevfifty before attempting to go 
through any scenarios I have created.

>   Just one major problem that needs to be fixed in future versions: 
 
> my fire elemental is level 26 w/ dex of 250.  He's almost so fast 
> that he outruns his own fireballs, which will probably turn 
extremely 
> annoying once he actually CAN outrun them.  That really should be 
> fixed.  Physically, it's not even possible.

Hehehe.  I've had mages and archmages who could outrun their 
fireballs.  Recently, I created a soldier who could outrun his 
returning knives.  That was quite a feat, considering how many knives 
he had.  I think I had an archer who could outrun his arrows.

Aside from that, I have had characters who could outrun long-range 
attacks.  There are only two solutions:  speed up the weapons OR set 
max limits for characters to run at.
